attributes.action: Implement Measures to cut down the number of school leavers unemployed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain has become a nation of long term unemployed, which are happy just to remain on the DHSS funding.
I petition the PM to instigate a programme where school leavers, (and possibly adults) not entering further education or training, receive only 6 months unemployment (or other) benefits.   After which the payments are stopped for at least a further 6 months; ie 6 months employment will entitle the claiment to 6 months befefits.
